pages.title: Pandora Tower
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Spawn locations: Birch Forest, Dark Forest, Forest, Flower Forest, Grove, Mangrove Swamp, Old Growth Birch Forest, Plains, Savanna, Savanna Plateau, Sunflower Plains, Swamp, Windswept Savanna
